duties_responsibilities.duty: Drive store sales and growth by personally selling to customers.
Proactively engage with customers, read cues, and respond effectively.
Provide customers with the perfect fit by asking effective questions.
Deliver a friendly and efficient cash wrap experience, processing customer transactions accurately and efficiently at the Point of Sale.
Reinforce customer buying decisions at checkout and encourage purchase of additional items.
Recover cash wrap selling zone and “go-backs”.
Process merchandise to be floor-ready and maintain back room and under stock to brand standards.
Replenish merchandise to brand standards to ensure product is placed on the sales floor and available for purchase.
Assist with floorset activity and maintenance of back room and under stock, including merchandise and non-merchandise, to brand standards to enable efficient replenishment.
Drive top line store sales results and grow the business through action and productivity.
Maintain a focus on bras as the premier product differentiator, to build loyalty and support the 'Best at Bras' culture.
Create customer awareness of programs available to them (i.e. Victoria’s Secret Angel Card, phone and email capture) to build customer loyalty.
Set personal goals and track individual and team performance to the goals.
Prepare for each shift by maintaining awareness of all sales, promotions, and applicable ringing procedures.
Take initiative to recover and replenish merchandise so it is available to sell.
Understand and adhere to visual merchandising brand standards.
Assist in housekeeping of the sales floor and communicate maintenance issues.
Keep an awareness of, and build personal capability in, loss prevention.
Reinforce store strategy to reduce shrink.
Support all activities related to providing a safe working environment.
